The_Atlas_Medallion.help: Earning The Atlas Medallion has granted you a permanent increase of +5 to your Max Endurance.

Super_Patriot.help: As a Super Patriot, you have been granted a permanent increase to your Max Endurance by 5%.

Freedom_Phalanx_Reserve.help: Earning Membership into the Freedom Phalanx Reserve has granted you a permanent increase to your Max Hit Points by 10%.

Task_Force_Commander.help: As a Task Force Commander, you have been granted a permanent increase to your Max Hit Points by 5%.

Portal_Jockey.help: As a Portal Jockey, you have been granted you a permanent increase to your Max Hit Points and Max Endurance by 5%.

Crey_CBX-9_Pistol.help: The Crey CBX-9 Pistol Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed even if they break free from the Immobilization. The Crey Cryo Pistol is extremely accurate, but it can only fire once every 25 minutes.
Crey_CBX-9_Pistol.targetHelp: The Crey CBX-9 Pistol has frozen you and may leave you Immobilized. It has reduced your Attack speed and Running speed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Eye_of_the_Magus.help: When you activate the Eye of the Magus, you are granted a very high bonus to Defense and Damage Resistance for one minute. You can only activate the Eye of the Magus once every 25 minutes.
Eye_of_the_Magus.attackerHit: The Eye of the Magus has significantly boosted your Defense and Damage Resistance.

Vanguard_Medal.help: When activated, your Vanguard Medal will increase the duration of all your Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse and Sleep powers for a short time. Knockback distance is also increased. The effect of this boost will last for 1 minute. You can only activate the Vanguard Medal once every 25 minutes.

messages.attackerHit: You tap into the power of the Vanguard Medal. The duration of all your control effects will be doubled for the next minute.

Geas_of_the_Kind_Ones.help: You have uncovered the secrets of Croatoa and have been awarded the Geas of the Kind Ones. Like most supernatural gifts, the Geas is both a blessing and a curse. By using it you can greatly increase your recharge speed, Endurance recovery, and Accuracy for 1 minute. However, your Defense will be severely reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You feel the blessing of the Kind Ones enter you.

Marshall.help: You've been awarded the title of Marshal for your service to Arachnos. This has given you a 5% increase to Endurance.

High_Pain_Threshold.help: You've got an incredibly High Pain Threshold, an after effect of which is that your Hit Points are 10%

Born_In_Battle.help: You've proved yourself as Born in Battle, adding 5% to both your Endurance and Hit Point totals.

Stolen_Immobilizer_Ray.help: In your crime spree you have acquired an Immobilizer Ray. You're not sure where it came from, but it sure is useful for stopping foes in their tracks.
Stolen_Immobilizer_Ray.targetHelp: The Immobilizer Ray has frozen you and may leave you Immobilized. It has reduced your Attack speed and Running speed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Demonic_Aura.help: The spirit of a demon resides within you. Bringing it to the surface of your mind can make you highly resistant to all types of damage for a short time. You mustn't let the demon inside you out for too long, however, or it just may cost you your mortal soul.
Demonic_Aura.attackerHit: The Demonic Aura has significantly boosted your Defense and Damage Resistance.

Megalomaniac.help: You've wanted more control and now you have it. Activating this power increases the power of all of your Sleeps, Holds, Immobilize, and Confuse for 60 seconds. You can only activate it once every 25 minutes.
Megalomaniac.attackerHit: You have drawn on your iron will to increase the duration of all your control effects will be doubled for the next minute.

Invader.help: As a Task Force Commander, you have been granted a permanent increase to your Max Hit Points by 5%.

Force_of_Nature.help: You have shown yourself as a true Force of Nature, and been bestowed with the fury of the elements. Like most supernatural gifts, the Force of Nature is both a blessing and a curse. By using it you can greatly increase your recharge speed, Endurance recovery, and Accuracy for 1 minute. However, your Defense will be severely reduced.
Force_of_Nature.attackerHit: You are infused with the power of the Elements.

Iron_Man.help: You are a true Iron Man. You persistence and stamina have resulted in your Max Hit Points and Max Endurance increasing by 10%.

Portable_Workbench.help: You can use this power to summon a Portable Workbench, which will allow anyone nearby to craft recipes. The Portable Workbench lasts 5 minutes when summoned and can be summoned every 5 minutes. You may not summon the Portable Workbench in PvP enabled areas.

RIWE_Accolade_Power.help: You have gained the ability to deflect and protect yourself from mental invasions of all sorts. By focusing your mind using this technique, you gain strong defense against Psionic attacks and are moderately resistant to Psionic damage while this power is active. It lasts for 60 seconds per use. Recharge: Very Long
RIWE_Accolade_Power.attackerHit: By focusing your mind using this technique, you gain strong defense against Psionic attacks and are moderately resistant to Psionic damage for 60 seconds.
